name: Un/Lucky Castle
description:
Un/Lucky Castle is a small and short "luck" turn based game about rolling a die and shooting your enemy with cannon. This is a small project I started to see how far I'm in coding and building skills, and to also motive me on making a bigger game.

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED

Controls:

Roll the die using "R" (You can roll twice every turn)

Shoot using "S"

Sounds used from freesound.org and thanks to these people:

- iwanPlays

- Debsound

- man

- schoman3
